entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 8.

entry.title: Tuesday night: Ice pellets. Low minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of ice pellets overnight with risk of freezing rain. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Freezing rain or rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Freezing rain or ice pellets changing to periods of rain in the afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm in the afternoon. Local rainfall amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 2. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
